description:
CHILDHOOD 童年

1.David Bowie was born David Robert Jones in Brixton, London, on 8 January 1947.e shares the same birthday as Elvis. 大卫·鲍威原名大卫·罗伯特·琼斯，于1947年1月8日出生于英国伦敦。他和埃尔维斯（猫王）同天生日。

2.Rock guitarist Peter Frampton was Bowie's friend at school - his dad was head of the art department. He's gone on to play guitar with Bowie many times during his career摇滚吉他手皮特·弗兰普森是鲍威校友兼好友——他的父亲是艺术系领导。他在职业生涯中，为鲍威弹过多次吉他。

PRE-FAME 成名前

3.Around 1967, he wrote songs for actor Paul Nicholas.1967年左右，他为演员保罗·尼古拉斯写过几首歌曲。

4.1967 also saw the release of a single, The Laughing Gnome, which many fans argue is the worst song he has ever recorded.鲍威1967年还发行了单曲《The Laughing Gnome》，许多粉丝都认为这是他录过最难听的歌曲。

STARMAN成名

5.Bowie's first hit in the UK - 1969's Space Oddity - was used by the BBC in the moon landing.鲍威在英国的第一首热单是1969年发行的《Space Oddity》——之后这首歌在月球登陆时被BBC使用。

6.He was voted fourth in the BBC's Culture Show public vote in 2006 to discover Britain's greatest living icons. Above him were Sir Paul McCartney (3), Morrissey (2) and Sir David Attenborough at number one.为寻找英国最伟大的在世标志性人物，2006年BBC进行了文化演出公众人物评选，大卫·鲍威排名第四。前三名分别为保罗·麦卡特尼爵士（第三），莫里西（第二）和戴维·阿滕伯勒爵士（第一）。

THE PERFORMER 表演家

7.Bowie was hit in the eye by a lollipop while on stage in Oslo, Norway in 2004. 2004年在挪威奥斯陆表演时，鲍威被棒棒糖击中眼睛。

8.Director Nicolas Roeg cast Bowie in his first leading role, as a stranded alien in the 1976 film The Man Who Fell to Earth. In one scene, shot in a record store, a poster for Bowie's Young Americans album can clearly be seen hanging from the ceiling.导演尼古拉斯·罗伊格让鲍威在自己于1976年拍摄的电影《天降财神》中担任电影主角。鲍威在影片中扮演一位滞留地球的外星人。电影中有个镜头，鲍威的《青年美国人》专辑海报就挂在天花板上。

PERSONAL LIFE私生活

9.Bowie married Somalian supermodel Iman in 1992. They have a daughter Alexandria Zahra Jones, born in 2000. Iman has a Bowie knife tattooed on her ankle in tribute to her husband.鲍威在1992年和索马利亚超模艾曼结婚，并在2000年生下女儿亚历山大·萨拉·琼斯。为表对丈夫的敬意，艾曼在脚踝上刻有鲍威刀的纹身。

THE MUSICIAN音乐家

10.He was in 10 bands - The Konrads, The Hooker Brothers, The King Bees, The Manish Boys, The Lower Third, The Buzz, The Riot Squad, The Hype, Tin Machine and Tao Jones Index. (Some of these performed under other names). He plays just about every instrument on Diamond Dogs - including the famous guitar riff on Rebel Rebel.他曾经在10只乐队中工作过——包括康拉兹乐队、虎克兄弟乐队、王蜂乐队、坏男孩乐队、地三乐队、蜂鸣乐队、混乱军团乐队、之声乐队、镀锡机乐队和陶·琼斯乐队。（其中一些乐队以其他名称演出。）在《钻石狗》中，他几乎弹遍了各种乐器——包括《叛逆将军》中著名的即兴吉他。

MISCELLANEOUS 全面发展

11.His image appears on every single one of his album covers - except the UK release of The Buddha Of Suburbia and his final album, Blackstar. 每张单曲封面上都有他的照片，除了他在英国发行的《The Buddha Of Suburbia》以及他最后一张专辑《Blackstar》。

12.His favourite artists were Tintoretto, John Bellany, Erich Heckel, Picasso and Michael Ray Charles.他最喜欢的艺术家有丁托列托、约翰·贝兰尼、埃里奇·赫克尔、毕加索和米迦勒·雷·查尔斯。

13.Bowie drew, painted, sculpted and wrote in his spare time.业余时间，鲍威还会绘图、作画、雕塑和写作。

14.In 2004, Rolling Stone ranked him 39th on their list of the 100 greatest artists of all time, and 23rd on their list of the best singers of all time.2004年，在滚石评选出的史上最伟大100名艺术家中，鲍威排名第39；而在滚石选出的最伟大歌手中，他排名23。
